name: Central Nervous Breakdown
description:
*This game contains pixel renditions of several internal organs, which some players may find unsettling.*

Take on the role of the central nervous system of an evolving organism and try to stay alive as long as possible while manually breathing, blinking, and beating your heart.

Instructions: The game is played entirely with the left-mouse button. Try to stay alive as long as possible.

Note: The game resolution is 720 x 1080 because the jam details said to envision what your game would look like if played on mobile and it was one of the resolutions that was recommended for mobile development.
